title: Pineapples are awesome
content: Pineapples is the best fruit in existence because they are spicky and are delicious. Where else can you find another fruit that could act as a weapon in addition to being nutritious???? We should all learn to appreciate the awesomeness of the pineapple.
author: Pineapple Lover
